title: Induction stovetops, Wood-Look Grain Flooring, Slow close cabinets
posting_body: Welcome to The Logan
At The Logan enjoy top-notch amenities, specialized services, and a Whole Foods grocery on site (coming soon!).
The Logan’s unique construction boasts over-sized, spacious homes for lease, including apartments and townhomes.
Amenities Include:
Slow close cabinets
3 selections of modern apartment finishes to choose from
Spacious work from home friendly apartment and townhome floorplans
Wood-Look Grain Flooring
Stainless steel LG appliance suite
Large under counter mounted sinks
Sliding doors to bedrooms maximize exterior views and natural light
Individually controlled air conditioning and heat
Under cabinet LED lighting
Induction stovetops
Floor-to-ceiling glazing promotes a sense of indoor/outdoor living
